Title: NGilead
Description:
NGilead permits you to use your NHibernate POCO (and especially the partially loaded ones) outside the .NET Virtual Machine (to Silverlight for example...) without pain. 
No lazy initialisation or serialization exception. Just POCO and Domain Driven Design :) !
HomeWiki:
Overview

NGilead permits you to use your NHibernate POCO (and especially the partially loaded ones) outside the .NET Virtual Machine (to Silverlight for example...) without pain.
No lazy initialisation or serialization exception. Just POCO and Domain Driven Design :) !

NGilead is the port of the Gilead library, used in Java world to send Hibernate entities from server to client side (Flex, GWT, ...).

Development team

NGilead has been developed by Bruno Marchesson, author of the Java library, the Berger-Levrault engineers (Philippe Lanco, Didier Lienard, Philippe Luciani, André Morassut and Laurent Smadja) and the assistance of Benjamin Laffont from Valtech.
